room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Quarters" by Ctrl Shift Escape in Greenville (NC)
review: We had an amazing time doing the revenge of Blackbeard escape room. 3 of the 4 of us had never done an escape room before. Great instructions at the start, and very helpful hints! Loved the whole thing! Thanks for a great time, Bill!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Quarters" by Ctrl Shift Escape in Greenville (NC)
